text: The Library of Birmingham is a public library in Central Birmingham, England. It is in Centenary Square next to the Birmingham Repertory Theatre and Baskerville House. It opened on the 3 September 2013 and cost Â£8.5 million to build. It has been called the largest public library in the United Kingdom. ==References== Category:Libraries in the United Kingdom Category:Buildings and structures in Birmingham
title: Library of Birmingham
